verses.verse: And on the third<WG5154> day<WG2250> there was a wedding<WG1062> in Cana<WG2580> of Galilee,<WG1056> and the mother<WG3384> of Jesus<WG2424> was there;<WG1563>
and Jesus<WG2424> also<WG2532> was invited,<WG2564> and His disciples,<WG3101> to the wedding.<WG1062>
And when the wine<WG3631> gave<WG5302> out, the mother<WG3384> of Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to Him, "They have<WG2192> no<WG3756> wine.<WG3631>"
And Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to her, "Woman,<WG1135> what<WG5101> do I have to do with you? My hour<WG5610> has<WG2240> not yet<WG3768> come.<WG2240>"
His mother<WG3384> said<WG3004> to the servants,<WG1249> "Whatever<WG3739> <WG5100> <WG302> He says<WG3004> to you, do<WG4160> it."

Now<WG1161> there were six<WG1803> stone<WG3035> waterpots<WG5201> set<WG2749> there<WG1563> for the Jewish<WG2453> custom of purification,<WG2512> containing<WG5562> twenty<WG1417> or<WG2228> thirty<WG5140> gallons<WG3355> each.<WG303>
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them, "Fill<WG1072> the waterpots<WG5201> with water.<WG5204>" And they filled<WG1072> them up to the brim.<WG507>
And He said<WG3004> to them, "Draw<WG501> [some] out now,<WG3568> and take<WG5342> it to the headwaiter.<WG755>" And they took<WG5342> it [to him.]

And when<WG5613> the headwaiter<WG755> tasted<WG1089> the water<WG5204> which had become<WG1096> wine,<WG3631> and did not know<WG3609> where<WG4159> it came<WG1510> from (but the servants<WG1249> who had drawn<WG501> the water<WG5204> knew<WG3609>), the headwaiter<WG755> called<WG5455> the bridegroom,<WG3566>

and said<WG3004> to him, "Every<WG3956> man<WG444> serves<WG5087> the good<WG2570> wine<WG3631> first,<WG4413> and when<WG3752> [men] have drunk<WG3184> freely,<WG3184> [then] that which is poorer;<WG1640> you have kept<WG5083> the good<WG2570> wine<WG3631> until<WG2193> now.<WG737>"

This<WG3778> beginning<WG746> of [His] signs<WG4592> Jesus<WG2424> did<WG4160> in Cana<WG2580> of Galilee,<WG1056> and manifested<WG5319> His glory,<WG1391> and His disciples<WG3101> believed<WG4100> in Him.

After<WG3326> this<WG3778> He went<WG2597> down<WG2597> to Capernaum,<WG2746> He and His mother,<WG3384> and [His] brothers,<WG80> and His disciples;<WG3101> and there<WG1563> they stayed<WG3306> a few<WG3756> <WG4183> days.<WG2250>
And the Passover<WG3957> of the Jews<WG2453> was at hand,<WG1451> and Jesus<WG2424> went<WG305> up to Jerusalem.<WG2414>
And He found<WG2147> in the temple<WG2413> those<WG3588> who were selling<WG4453> oxen<WG1016> and sheep<WG4263> and doves,<WG4058> and the moneychangers<WG2773> seated.<WG2521>

And He made<WG4160> a scourge<WG5416> of cords,<WG4979> and drove<WG1544> [them] all<WG3956> out of the temple,<WG2413> with the sheep<WG4263> and the oxen;<WG1016> and He poured<WG1632> out the coins<WG2772> of the moneychangers,<WG2855> and overturned<WG396> their tables;<WG5132>

and to those<WG3588> who were selling<WG4453> the doves<WG4058> He said,<WG3004> "Take<WG142> these<WG3778> things<WG3778> away;<WG142> stop<WG3361> making<WG4160> My Father's house<WG3624> a house<WG3624> of merchandise.<WG1712>"
His disciples<WG3101> remembered<WG3403> that it was written,<WG1125> "Zeal<WG2205> for Thy house<WG3624> will consume<WG2719> me."
The Jews<WG2453> therefore<WG3767> answered<WG611> and said<WG3004> to Him, "What<WG5101> sign<WG4592> do You show<WG1166> to us, seeing that You do<WG4160> these<WG3778> things<WG3778>?"
Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG3004> to them, "Destroy<WG3089> this<WG3778> temple,<WG3485> and in three<WG5140> days<WG2250> I will raise<WG1453> it up."
The Jews<WG2453> therefore<WG3767> said,<WG3004> "It took forty-six years<WG2094> to build<WG3618> this<WG3778> temple,<WG3485> and will You raise<WG1453> it up in three<WG5140> days<WG2250>?"
But He was speaking<WG3004> of the temple<WG3485> of His body.<WG4983>

When<WG3753> therefore<WG3767> He was raised<WG1453> from the dead,<WG3498> His disciples<WG3101> remembered<WG3403> that He said<WG3004> this;<WG3778> and they believed<WG4100> the Scripture,<WG1124> and the word<WG3056> which<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> had spoken.<WG3004>

Now<WG1161> when<WG5613> He was in Jerusalem<WG2414> at the Passover,<WG3957> during<WG1722> the feast,<WG1859> many<WG4183> believed<WG4100> in His name,<WG3686> beholding<WG2334> His signs<WG4592> which<WG3739> He was doing.<WG4160>
But Jesus,<WG2424> on His part,<WG846> was not entrusting<WG4100> Himself<WG846> to them, for He knew<WG1097> all<WG3956> men,<WG3956>
and because<WG3754> He did not need<WG5532> anyone<WG5100> to bear<WG3140> witness<WG3140> concerning<WG4012> man<WG444> for He Himself<WG846> knew<WG1097> what<WG5101> was in man.<WG444>
